column2: It's okay, Captain. You did the right thing. Discipline should take priority on a ship.
If you understand that, why did you start that experiment? Why didn't you report it to me?
Absolutely. If there's an infraction, there should be punishment. Of course, it depends on the circumstances, but not in this case. I follow the same principle with my troops.
If you understand that, why did you start that experiment? Why didn't you report it to me?
*Henry gazes straight into your eyes.* The idea popped up too suddenly, and you were busy with something.
